snippet: The United States has broadened its fight against the Islamic State, targeting the group’s senior leader in Libya on Friday night, the Pentagon announced on Saturday.
lead_paragraph: The United States has broadened its fight against the Islamic State, targeting the group’s senior leader in Libya on Friday night, the Pentagon announced on Saturday.

headline.main: ISIS Leader in Libya Is Targeted in U.S. Airstrike
